fields.fieldDescription: Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.

Code word which identifies the type of direct debit instruction.  Valid codes are as follows AUTH - Authorized NAUT - Non Authorized RTND - Returned OTHR - Other info additional info which is saved in field IMT_TXT_ADD_INFO
contains the registration reference authorising a creditor to take part in a direct debit scheme on a MT104 Swift Message Type.
This column will store Boolean values from attribute useSendersCorrespondentForReceiver.

On the MT 100 there is an optional field 71A which is for "Details of Charges". At the remittance instruction level the sender can specify whether any charges applied by the receiving bank are for the: BEN - Charges are to be borne by the Beneficiary Customer, or OUR - Charges are to be borne by the sender
If the instruction code (IMT_CDE_INST_CODE) is "OTHR" then this is a free form text field used in identifying further information.
